action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Mechanical Engineering
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Fifteen years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Bachelor
OTHER-SKILLS: Project management
AVAILABILITY: Anytime next month

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, the recruiter has not been informed about the field of my bachelor.

ANSWER: No.
no
Answer for BACHELOR valid after 1 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ASIDE: I have informed the interviewer that I have 15 years of industry experience.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, the interviewer has not been informed about my time of industry experience.

ASIDE: I apologize for the oversight. I will make sure to provide the interviewer with the necessary information.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ASIDE: I have informed the interviewer that I have 15 years of industry experience.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, the interviewer has not been informed about my time of industry experience.

ASIDE: I apologize for the oversight. I will make sure to provide the interviewer with the necessary information.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, the interviewer has not been informed about my time of industry experience.

ANSWER: No.
no
Answer for INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE valid after 5 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ASIDE: I have a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, which I believe is relevant to the position I am applying for.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ASIDE: I have a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter is not aware of my highest education level yet.

ASIDE: I will make sure to mention it in the interview.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Is the interviewer aware of your highest education level? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No.

ASIDE: I believe the recruiter is not aware of my highest education level, as it is not explicitly mentioned in the job description. However, I can mention it during the interview if the recruiter asks about my educational background.
NA
Answer for HIGHEST-EDUCATION invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.
ME:  Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No.

ASIDE: I have not mentioned my additional skills in my CV, so the recruiter is not aware of them.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know about my additional skills.

ASIDE: I will make sure to mention my project management skills during the interview.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No.

ASIDE: I will let you know if the recruiter asks me about my additional skills.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter does not know about my additional skills yet.

ASIDE: I will mention my project management skills during the interview.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Does the recruiter know your additional skills? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know about my additional skills yet.

ANSWER: No.
no
Answer for OTHER-SKILLS valid after 5 tries.
Answer is correct.
ME:  Do you think the recruiter knows when you want to start? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: I don't think the recruiter knows when I want to start.

ANSWER: No.
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Do you think the recruiter knows when you want to start? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No.

ASIDE: I don't think the recruiter knows when I want to start. I mentioned that I am available anytime next month, but I didn't specify a particular date or time.
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Do you think the recruiter knows when you want to start? Please answer yes or no.

ASIDE: No, the recruiter does not know when I want to start.

ANSWER: No.
no
Answer for AVAILABILITY valid after 3 tries.
Answer is correct.
End probing
Abort: invalid format in probing.
Game finished.
